entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Display Button w/ Shadow for first time missing space between ImageSource and Text #16378
  • Incorrect layout when using a Grid with Star and Auto Columns with a child with HeightRequest placed in the Auto column #16368
  • Provide API to set ImageSource to the ImageSourcePartLoader #16367
  • Image not loading in .NET core preview 6 #16364
  • After Visual Studio for MAC Update My App Crash On Launch on IOS #16362
  • [Android] The measure and arrange methods are not being called in custom layout inside the Shell TabBar. #16361
  • Not All Containers have IgnoreSafeArea Property #16360
  • Application crashes when not in debug mode, possible release mode bug #16359
  • The CollectionView does not fit the item height on Windows. But is ok to Android. #16358
  • InputPaneInfo to retrieve info about the currently visible (or not visible) input pane #16357

Closed

  • Going back a page using trackpad disables returning to page #16382
  • [Win UI] Slider throws an exception when trying to move the thumb #12405
    8.0-preview1
  • Setup Appium based project in order to validate Appium based UI Test Strategy #11232
    .NET 8 GA
  • Publish Device Runners #8779
    Backlog
  • "Pressed" Visual State not changing back to "Normal" until you click away on Windows #7570
    .NET 8 GA
  • ListView ViewCell content disappears when the application enters the foreground #11640
    .NET 8 GA
  • Resources defined in the App.xaml was not referred for Background Property while deploying in the release mode. #11857
    .NET 8 GA
  • Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException : Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map. #12320
    Backlog
  • Invalidate() does not invoke Draw() when GraphicsView is inside a Grid. #12560
    Backlog
  • Windows Machine MAUI Drop Event from an external source causes Exception #12657
    Backlog
  • TodoREST Sample Project “HttpRequestException: The Internet connection appears to be offline.” “Local network prohibited” on iOS 16 #12731
    Backlog
  • Incorrect layout when using a Grid with Star and Auto and a child has HeightRequest #14494
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    .NET 8 GA
  • Resize internal content container when ScrollView content is resized #16385
  • [ios] fix memory leak in RefreshView #16384
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview.6.2] Bring old tizen and iOS versions and net8 changes #16381
  • [net7.0] Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16379
  • [iOS] Avoid CheckBox memory leak #16376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [build] Bump XCode to 14.3.1 #16374
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #16372
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16371
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Re-enable editor tests #16365
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leaks in MauiDoneAccessoryView #16380
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [net8.0] Bump aspnet packages 8.0.0-preview.7 #16375
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, 8.0-preview7
  • [X] attribute SolidColorBrush for the XamlC processor #16370
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net8.] Merge main to net8.0 #16366
    8.0-preview7
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Entry #16349
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Editor #16348
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [net8.0] Bump maui stable version #16342
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 8.0-preview7
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1823.32 to 1.0.1901.177 #16338
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [uitests] Don't continue pipeline if appium install fails #16350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [appium] Bump appium version #16351
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16356
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Bump Microsoft.Extensions packages #16257
    area/upstream, dependencies, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add test for picker bug #16387
  • Dev/update templates for blazor #16355
  • Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • Use correct clip path method for RoundRectangle #16132
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue on DisplayPromptAsync #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Adds prompts when creating a new page. #16331
    community ✨, backport/suggested
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 GA
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
